column1: Unique identifier for this dataset.Lower-case alphanumeric and dashes only.
column2:
Display title (not a description).
Do not end with a full stop.
column4: Description about the dataset. First sentence should be a succinct brief description, followed by more if needed.
column5: When the data was initially released to the public.
column6: When the data was most recently updated.
column7: How often this data will be updated.
column18: If the dataset is supplied in multiple formats, give each format a separate entry.
column19: The ONS categories under which this dataset falls
column20: Indicate whether this is a National Statistic or not.
column21: The data's given precision (e.g. "to the nearest per cent")
column22: Internet link to a page about this data.
column23: Internet link directly to the dataset.
column24: Brief description to clarify when there are multiple downloads.
column25: Internet link to a page about the taxonomies used, if available.
column26: The Department under which this data is collected or published.
column27: The Agency or Arms Length Body that is responsible for the dataset, if appropriate.
column28: Permanent contact point for members of the public; not an individual.
column32: The licence that the data is under. Should generally be core UK Crown Copyright.
column33:
Quick labels to describe the dataset.
Lowercase alphanumeric and dashes, each tag seperated by a space.

column4: Information about aid projects funded by the Department for International Development. The dataset contains project descriptions, dates, purposes, locations, sectors, summary financial data and whether or not conditions are attached.
column32: UK Crown Copyright with data.gov.uk rights
